title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients:
• 200 g spaghetti
• 100 g pancetta
• 2 eggs
• 40 g grated pecorino
• 1 clove garlic
• Salt & pepper
instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
2. Sauté pancetta with garlic; discard garlic.
3. Whisk eggs and pecorino, season with pepper.
4. Drain pasta (reserve ¼ cup water) and toss with pancetta.
5. Off-heat, fold in egg mixture, loosening with pasta water.
6. Serve immediately with extra cheese.

title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
ingredients:
• 2 slices sourdough
• 1 ripe avocado
• 1 egg
• 1 tsp lemon juice
• Chili flakes, salt, pepper
instructions:
1. Toast bread until crisp.
2. Mash avocado with lemon, salt, and pepper.
3. Poach egg for about 3 min (runny yolk).
4. Spread avocado on toast, top with egg.
5. Finish with chili flakes.

title: Dark-Chocolate Brownies
ingredients:
• 200 g dark chocolate (70%)
• 150 g unsalted butter
• 3 large eggs
• 250 g sugar
• 100 g plain flour
• 30 g cocoa powder
• 1 tsp vanilla extract
• Pinch of sea salt
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 175 °C / 350 °F. Line an 8-inch pan.
2. Melt chocolate and butter together; cool slightly.
3. Whisk eggs, sugar, and vanilla until pale.
4. Fold in chocolate mixture, then sifted flour, cocoa, and salt.
5. Pour into pan; bake 28–30 min (fudgy center).
6. Cool completely before cutting.
